title: Why is zz'rot portal disabled????
body:
Why isn't there an announcement or something saying that zz'rot portal is disabled? That item was getting me wins top lane and all of a sudden its disabled!

rito explain!{{item:3512}} {{item:3512}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hypnotits,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OAHzzBf8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-17T20:51:13.148+0000)
>
> What's zz'rot portal

A good item.
There's an announcement saying it's disabled now.

As far as I'm aware, it was causing some nasty interactions with enemy minions. A quick Google search of 6.3 Zz'Rot bug should bring up a few relevant results :p

You can check the latest updates on the Service Status page:
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
